content.text: Hello! I'm going to hairdresser school.
Oh, that's cool! What made you decide to go into that field?
I've always been interested in hair and makeup. I love the way it can change someone's appearance and make them feel more confident.
That's a great reason to go into the field! I'm sure you'll be great at it.
Thank you! I'm excited to get started.
What kind of hair do you like to style the most?
I like to do all kinds of hair, but my favorite is probably long, wavy hair.
I love long hair too! It's so beautiful.
Yeah, it is. I think it's the most flattering on everyone.
I agree. Do you have any plans for after you graduate from hairdresser school?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about opening my own salon, but I'm still not sure.
That would be amazing! I'm sure you'd be great at it.
Well, it was nice talking to you! I hope you have a great day.
